children.markdown:
[![](https://i1.wp.com/photos22.flickr.com/24326928_e142758531.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/24326928/ "photo sharing") [Waiting for a bus](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/24326928/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
Tonight, I was very proud of this city. Less than 12 hours after a bomb ripped a London bus apart, London commuters were happily queuing for a bus home.
